name: get-companies-companyId-terminalOrders
description:
Returns a lists of terminal products orders for the company identified in the path.
To filter the list, use one or more of the query parameters.

To make this request, your API credential must have one of the following [roles](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management API—Terminal ordering read
* Management API—Terminal ordering read and write

companyId.description: The unique identifier of the company account.

status.description: The order status. Possible values (not case-sensitive): Placed, Confirmed, Cancelled, Shipped, Delivered.

offset.description: The number of orders to skip.

limit.description: The number of orders to return.

$ul: **data**: List of orders for payment terminal packages and parts.
